Items.Title: HSBC Premier Current Account
Items.Summary: Get an account that travels with you. Available in multiple currencies, it comes with an international debit card, a dedicated Premier Relationship Manager to help you manage your money and take advantage of investment opportunities. You will also get 24/7 Internet banking with Global View so you can manage all your accounts with just one log on.
Items.KeyFeatures:
• Free HSBC Premier Credit Card
  • Free instant money transfers between your HSBC accounts globally
  • Your Dedicated Relationship Manager
  • Wealth Management
  • Preferential rates
Items.CircleTitleOneDescription: Enjoy your HSBC Premier Credit Card without any annual membership fees
Items.CircleTitleTwoDescription: Free instant money transfers within 6 seconds between your HSBC accounts globally

Items.Title: HSBC Premier Savings Account
Items.Summary: Get an account that travels with you. Available in multiple currencies, it comes with an international debit card, a dedicated Premier Relationship Manager to help you manage your money and take advantage of investment opportunities. You will also get 24/7 Internet banking with Global View so you can manage all your accounts with just one log on.  The Savings Account also enables secure and flexible way to save for the things that are important to you. Not only do you earn interest, but you also have immediate access to your money.

Items.Title: Current Account
Items.Summary: An HSBC Current account is a transactional account offering 24/7 access through online banking, mobile banking and phone banking, allowing you to manage your money with ease.
Items.KeyFeatures:
• Up to 2 free cash withdrawals on non-HSBC Switch ATMs per month
  • Free Online Banking, Phone Banking, Mobile Banking and SMS alerts
  • Choice between AED, USD, GBP and Chinese Renminbi account currencies
  • Free HSBC VISA Platinum Select Credit Card
Items.CircleTitleOneDescription: Up to 2 free cash withdrawals and 1 free balance inquiry on non-HSBC Switch ATMs per month
